hints.title: Cloning Preserves Einstein Equations at QSD
hints.content:
119: :label: thm-cloning-preserves-gr
120: 
121: At the quasi-stationary distribution, the cloning operator does not introduce any source terms or modify the form of the Einstein equations. The stress-energy tensor is:
122: 
123: $$
124: T_{\mu\nu}[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = m\rho \langle v^\mu v^\nu \rangle_{\text{QSD}}
125: $$
126: 
127: where the velocity distribution is Maxwellian with effective temperature $T_{\text{QSD}}$ determined by the energy balance between Langevin heating and cloning cooling.
128: 
129: **Consequence**: The Einstein equations remain:
130: 
131: $$
132: G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G T_{\mu\nu}
133: $$
134: 
135: with no modifications from the cloning dynamics.
136: 
137: **Status**: This is **conditionally proven** assuming:
138: 1. ✅ Momentum conservation (rigorously proven, {prf:ref}`lem-no-momentum-source-cloning`)
139: 2. ⚠️ Energy balance at QSD (plausible, requires full McKean-Vlasov analysis with cloning)

118: :::{prf:theorem} Cloning Preserves Einstein Equations at QSD
119: :label: thm-cloning-preserves-gr
120: 
121: At the quasi-stationary distribution, the cloning operator does not introduce any source terms or modify the form of the Einstein equations. The stress-energy tensor is:
122: 
123: $$
124: T_{\mu\nu}[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = m\rho \langle v^\mu v^\nu \rangle_{\text{QSD}}
125: $$
126: 
127: where the velocity distribution is Maxwellian with effective temperature $T_{\text{QSD}}$ determined by the energy balance between Langevin heating and cloning cooling.
128: 
129: **Consequence**: The Einstein equations remain:
130: 
131: $$
132: G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G T_{\mu\nu}
133: $$
134: 
135: with no modifications from the cloning dynamics.
136: 
137: **Status**: This is **conditionally proven** assuming:
138: 1. ✅ Momentum conservation (rigorously proven, {prf:ref}`lem-no-momentum-source-cloning`)
139: 2. ⚠️ Energy balance at QSD (plausible, requires full McKean-Vlasov analysis with cloning)
140: 3. ⚠️ Maxwellian velocity distribution at QSD (standard assumption, requires detailed balance proof)
